1.content:
Our boy Mikenopa, woke up and was feeling as if he was on a wild tiger chase to Kenya....er........Zimbabwe. Mikenopa went out of bed in the most exciting from of sitting up that he could imagine, "supa coola dance PARTY" as he would call it. He stretched his arms up, opened his mouth as wide ad can be, breathed in, and calmly, smoothly, YELLED AT THE TOP OF HIS LUNGS, "PUCA PUCA DANCA PARTY PUCA PUCA DANCA PARTY." After a tiring five minutes of yelling, he decided that he should stand up and do something. Mikenopa stood up, opened his door and....oops my bad, I forgot to introduce my self. I am the narrator of this story I may or may not be in it, but I can tell you this, I am Meekehapa.

Ok, so now where where we? Aw yes here it is, Mikenopa opening the door. Mikenopa opened his medal door, the only door in the room that imprisoned him in a very tight are, scaring him and causing him terrible nightmares. But he's to manly to recall any of it, oh Mikenopa was a true man. He looked out his doorway and saw that his dog had not yet woken up, but he didn't recall having a dog, so it didn't really bother him much. Mikenopa crawled to his basement and saw there was a note on his door. Grabbing it he the repeated on eating it, and finally coughing it up to read it. He read, "Wear RED shirt and BLUE pants to diner." Mikenopa got dressed and put on..... I'm going to let you decide this one for me, what did he wear?
1.title: Our boy is a man now.

choices: YES WALK WOULD BE GUD YES
doent go to tha park, GO TO THE ZOO YES!!
11.content:
A red shirt, and blue pants.

Mikenopa rushes into the dining room to see nothing, but white walls with no carpet. A light square outlining is barely seen on the dining floor. Mikenopa, being the true man he is, he bravely opens up the hatch to discover his dining room, with breakfast sitting on the table. Eggs, toast, sausage, yum. No one was to be seen though.
Mikenopa eats all of the food in one bite. Aw, awight. Mikenopa opens a door in the room. a flood of light comes through and the outdoors reveals itself. "HEUHEUAHEUAHUEAHUEAH IT TIME GO TO THE PARK YES!!" he yells and runs outside, falling off his deck, not realising its there. He gets up and runs even faster, and runs into his tree. He gets up again, and runs, and then hits his fence. "OKAYE MAYBE I SHUD WALK YES?"
11.title: RED shirt BLUE pants

111.content: Steps in a mine field.
111.title: YES WALK WOULD BE GUD YES

112.content: "RUN BITCHES", Mikenopa screams as he runs through the streets firing his "hand" guns in the air. "IMA SHOOT DEM PARK!" "IMA BE AN HERO YAAAAAAAAAAAA!" Mikenopa says. Finaly Mikenopa comes across the field "O" doom 6000. He runs through it so fast that only one mine explodes and lands him in the park unsafely and braking off all of his fingers and toes and hands and feet and shins. Leaving him, yes with, NUBS. Later on Mikenopa being astononly clever, he runs up to the nearest WHITE man and pokes him on the back. This man was very very pale. and had some kind of haloween mask thing on. "Darbit I wish i chose that holaween mask" shouts Mikenopa. Yelling so loud in the man's ear he turns around, to be, the one and only.........TELL MMEE IM FRAGGIN OLD!!!!
112.title: NAW RUN RUN

1121.content:
Ralph Nader thinks you are running around foolishly and you should be more careful. He wraps a seat belt all around Mikenopa and he is strangled to death by the seat belt.

dang.
1121.title: Ralph Nader

1122.content:
Ron Paul turns around and launches a punch right in ol' Mikenopa's face. Mikenopa disintegrates and dies.

Ron Paul laughs.
1122.title: Ron Paul

1123.content:
A man in a suit and a hat turns around and stares at the small kid. "Hey kid what are you looking at???? My mask?? It's not even a mask. It's.. my skin." He takes off the suit and hat and reveals a leaf and an H. " What are you doing in the park for?" says Mikenopa. "I'm here for the tf3 convention, aren't you?" says hughmonclo in an arrogant tone. "yes." says Mikenopa and they run off to the convention.

AT THE CONVENTION

It looks like they need a ticket to get in. What do they do?
1123.title: Bar.....Hughmonclo

11231.content: Mikenopa sees none. All there is is young geeky teens and women.
11231.title: Steal an old man's ticket

11232.content: Mikenopa Jumps at the guard and bounces off of the blubbery guard and lands on Hughmonclo. Hughmonclo is now very happy. You see a man was about to shoot Hughmonclo with "FIYAH." "You saved my life" Hughmonclo whimpers. "Ay ah bet." Mikenopa says suferring from Brain dammage because he is an idiot. The man with fire then shoots the gaurd and runs in. What now?
11232.title: Charge the guard.

choices: Buy a new costume from someone at the convention
Go back and look for costumes already made
112321.content:
Mikenopa and Harrison Ford... I mean Hughmonclo run into the Convention... You see that everyone is dressed up as one of the classes. TVs and computers surround you at every corner. Nerds and geeks and jocks and bros surround them. You also see developers talking about their new game. But even they are dressed as a class.

As you look around, it seem that Hughmonclo and Mikenopa are the only ones not dressed up.
Eyes of your fellow ongoers look apon you with instant disgust. "Mikey.. did you bring any costumes?" says Hugh.
"Oh ya i did lawl must have like dropped them sumwher oops" says Mikenopa.
112321.title: M and H run in

1123211.content: Mikenopa goes up to a medic dressed man and holds up his trusty crown. it just so happens that this medic man was the tf3 head honcho and wants to make Mikenopa a charecter. Because he to is suffering from brain damage. What to do?
1123211.title: Buy a new costume from someone at the convention

choices: Were in doodle chat that explains all the babies
11232111.content: Hughmonclo has already used this this year. In doodle chat.
11232111.title: Hughmonclo uses solar beam

1123212.content: Mikenopa walks two steps back and says, "hear day are." Hughmonclo sees Mikenopa pull to rattle snakes out of a hole.
1123212.title: Go back and look for costumes already made

112322.content:
Mikenopa uses his HAND GUN and lights up the place. He kills all of the TF3 Developers and all the computers. Now TF3 will never come out thanks to Mikenopa.

Mikenopa commits suicide.
112322.title: Mikenopa Use attack HAND GUN

choices: The guard lets him in because the gaurd is half blind and.....
11233.content: Mikenopa runs to Hughmonclo and carefully rips some of his white papery skin, Mikenpa takes out his trusty blue crown and draws this, http://i33.tinypic.com/2vl42go.jpg . "I trick dat GUARD now." Mikenopa screams . Mikenopa hands the ticket to the guard and....
11233.title: Make one out of paper

112331.content: The guard pulls out a knife and is so thrilled he can finally butter his toast. Mikenopa jumps on the knife and dies.
112331.title: He dies

112332.content: The guard has a heart attack and falls on our young hero.
112332.title: The guard lets him in because the gaurd is half...

1123321.content:
"OH MAN I DIE IN STYLE."
http://www.littlestuffedbull.com/images/...
Mikenopa the dies from blood loss and stupidity.
1123321.title: Mikenopa uses attack TRICKET

11233212.content:
Mikenopa wake up from being beaten up by Ron Paul.

A pale man greets you. "Dude you got massacred! He He He." says the man and helps Mikenopa up.

"You look pretty bad BROSEPH, maybe I should like take you to a hospitol would that help? I mean you only have nubs too. That must have hurt. And you're bleeding." says the pale man, commonly referred to as Hughmonclo
11233212.title: Wake up

113.content: Mikenopa walks to the zoo with a hope in his heart he will see the famous purple toothed tiger that the zoo boasted. Mikenopa being a true hero jumps the zoo fence and lands in a bear infested shark desert. HE DIES!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
113.title: doent go to tha park, GO TO THE ZOO YES!!

12.content: Ah, Mikenopa's classic wear. But the bright green wakes up Mikenopas dog, and it mauls him.
12.title: RED shirt GREEN pants

13.content: As much as Mikenopa loves Halloween, he doesnt have one yet.
13.title: A fucking haloween costume

14.content:
This is true. I am the all powerful ruler. I should be telling him what to do and not some dumb old piece of paper!!
I decide that you should listen to it and wear what it says!!

GO BACK AND CHOOSE IT!!
14.title: Screw him we got Meekehapa
